article.text: Dr. Al-Haj Adam and Qatari Prime Minister Discuss Sudanese - Qatari Ties First Regional Conference on Small Arms to begin in Khartoum Tuesday Sudan releases four foreigners arrested in Heglieg and delivers them to Mbeki Emir of Qatar Calls for Coincidence between Arab Spring Revolutions and Just Peace in the Middle East President Al-Bashir discusses with Secretary General of Arab league developments and situation in Arab arena 3504 citizens of South Sudan leave Khartoum so far through Air Bridge operation to Juba Darfur Regional Authority and Arab League Discuss Coordination for Rehabilitation in Darfur Advisory Council of Cabinet Affairs Ministry stresses importance of information in decision-making Interior Minister to review refugees' situation at Council of States on Monday Judiciary to organize forum on judicial proceedings Wednesday Suicide bomber targets soldiers in Sanaa, several killed DUBAI (Reuters) - A suicide bomber targeted soldiers practicing for a military parade in the Yemeni capital Sanaa on Monday, killing several people, a police source said.
